description: After a recent update, the Google Chrome browser experiences an issue where the downloads bar at the bottom of the interface is removed, and the downloads bubble flag is no longer visible. This change has generated calls to helpdesk support from users who are accustomed to this feature, leading to a disruption in their typical workflow. The removal seems particularly concerning as it follows Google's decisions without providing an alternate method to restore the previous functionality, which indicates a significant alteration to user interface behavior in Google Chrome.
